description:
One day, second year high school student http://anidb.net/ch84096 [Amamiya Kanade] is suddenly scouted by legendary idol http://anidb.net/ch84093 [Mikami Haruto]. He now faces the life an idol with others in the same agency. He aims to make his CD debut in Dream Festival!, joined by the mysterious http://anidb.net/ch84095 [Oikawa Shin], the stoic http://anidb.net/ch84094 [Sasaki Jun`ya], the kind but passionate http://anidb.net/ch84098 [Katagiri Itsuki], and the clumsy but smart http://anidb.net/ch84097 [Sawamura Chizuru]. In order to receive the Dream Festival! Cards sent by fans, can Kanade and the others become the best on stage?
Note: The first episode received an advance release on Animate Channel, AbemaTV, and six other streaming services on September 23, 2016. The regular TV broadcast started on October 7, 2016.

REGULAR.description:
Kanade Amamiya, a normal high school student, suddenly gets scouted by the legendary idol, Hayato Mikami. Kanade was going to decline the offer to become an idol, but then he finds himself going at it with the rookie class idol, Junya Sasaki. What kind of training did they do to try to top one another?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The New Face That Plays Our Bonds!
絆を奏でるニューフェイス!

REGULAR.description:
Kanade Amamiya has succeeded in getting into the rookie class at D-Four Production, where he`s given the opportunity to observe Shin Oikawa`s work as an idol. Kanade tries his best to start a conversation with the taciturn Shin, but...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Shin Oikawa Is an Amazing Guy!!

REGULAR.description:
Shin Oikawa, a fellow idol in the rookie class with Kanade Amamiya, is caught in a scandal! Were the lyrics he wrote for "2032" about a past girlfriend?! When it looks like Shin`s idol career is in jeopardy, Kanade is unable to leave him alone and tries to find out what the lyrics really mean...
Source: crunchyroll

At the agency president`s recommendation, Kanade, Shin, and Junya form a unit. The three begin intense training to prepare for their first concert, but Kanade is having trouble keeping up with Junya`s rigorous schedule. What happened in Junya`s past to make him so desperate?
Source: crunchyroll

Traffic Signal has successfully completed their first concert... but now they`re in a battle to decide who gets to be the leader! Shin suggests they make the decision based on how well they each do at their next job. Then they find out that their next job is a variety program that puts idols in heart-pounding situations...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: はじめてのバラエティー!!!

REGULAR.description:
While Kanade is working hard at his lessons, he`s approached by an idol who`s already made his debut with the popular unit In-Show-Ha, Yuzuru Sawamura! Yuzuru is Chizuru`s twin brother, and he seems to have taken a serious liking to Kanade...
Source: crunchyroll

Traffic Signal`s activities are finally getting on track, and now they`re in the spotlight as the favorites to win at Battle Live, the upcoming competition many consider the preliminary event to Dream Fes. Meanwhile, rumor has it that a new guy has stormed the president`s office...
Source: crunchyroll

The members of Traffic Signal are disheartened by the results of Battle Live, but their spirits are lifted by the proposal of Chizuru and Itsuki joining them to form a new five-member unit. But for some reason, Itsuki doesn`t seem thrilled by the idea. What are the uncertainties lurking behind his calm smile?
Source: crunchyroll

The five rookies have formed DearDream and begun their idol activities anew... but all the slots set aside for new units at the agency`s upcoming events are filled by the explosively popular KUROFUNE, so they don`t even have a stage to stand on! What countermeasure has Junya come up with in the face of this setback?
Source: crunchyroll

DearDream was successful in putting on a concert their own way. Shortly after that, Junya was offered an enormous opportunity to train in New York under a world-famous entertainer. But if he leaves the country, he won`t be able to participate in Dream Fes. The decison Junya makes leaves Kanade emotionally shaken...
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: A Journey of Dreams: Junya`s Decision
Yumeno Tabi e: Jun`ya no Ketsui
夢の旅へ 純哉の決意

REGULAR.description:
It`s almost time for Dream Fes, and DearDream has made the daring decision to enter the festival with an original song. They manage to find someone to compose it for them, but Shin, who`s been tasked with writing the lyrics, is drawing a blank. Can DearDear complete their song in time?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: The Feeling We Want to Hold High!!!!!

REGULAR.description:
D-Four Production`s biggest event, Dream Festival, begins at last! But on the day of the event, Kanade disappears right before they`re due to perform. The other members frantically search for him. Will DearDream be able to take the stage?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: "Dre Fes!" Special Saikou Koeteru! Miracle Stage
「ドリフェス!」スペシャル サイコー超えてる! ミラクル☆ステージ
